_header: It was an Earl of much might / Beyond the sea Sir Theobald he hight
Bibliographic Ghosts: Cambridge MA, Harvard University, Houghton Library, Eng. 1032, ff. 1-2v: see 1818.
_description: Count Theobald, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Hit was an Erl of muche mihtBi ȝonde þe see sir Tebaut he
                    hiht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat is to sey to blisse of heueneGod wisse vs þider
                    þe weies euene. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou þe foundour off clereuans was saued by a mesel (f.
                        189vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 276.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
It was ane Erile of mikil mightBeȝonde þe se þat
                    theobald hight…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat es at saie to te blisse of heueneOure lorde vs
                    þidir lede þe waies euene . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
It was an erle of mekil myghtByȝonde þe ce þat
                    Tebande hight…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And him & vs til his folde bryngÞore euer es ioy
                    with outen endyng Amen
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
narracio de quodam comite Theobaldo & leproso per ipsum
                        Sustentatum (p. 191)

CULDd11.First Lines:
It was an Erl of moche myghtbe ȝond þe se þat Teband
                    hight…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Þat is to þe blisse of heueneGod wisse vs thedir
                    þe weyes euene Amen

BLHar2391.First Lines: It was an erl of mekyll myghtbe ȝond þe se þat theobald hyght…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …þat es to say to þe blys of heuenOwr lord vs lede ȝedir þe way amen
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica secunde post pasche (left margin, f. 187v), with “A tale” written above it

BLHar4196.First Lines: It was ane Erill of mekill mightBy ȝond þe se þat thebawd hight…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat es þe blis þat neuer sal blinGod wis vs þeder forto wyn
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.196-200.

HunHM129.First Lines:
Hit wos an erl off moche myghtBy ȝonde þe se þat
                    tybande hyght…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat is to say to þe bles off heuynGod lede vs
                    þedyr þe ways euyn

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Itt was a neryll of mykyll myghtbe ȝonde þe se þat
                    tebalde hyght…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
… þat es at say to þe blysse of heuenegod lede vs
                    þe way þidyr euene
